ygData.subject: RE: OT-High Speed Access
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Two lag-zones that I ve noticed.. The area out front of (and inside of) the Freeport Bank brings me to a crawl everytime. In ButcherBlock mountains, the
ygData.messageBody:
> time there are only around 20 people in the
> one. Even with that low number of people,
> lag still hits during the peak of battle.
> I am starting to believe lag is more a
> function of the zone you are in versus
> your connection speed.

Two lag-zones that I've noticed.. The area out front of (and inside of) the
Freeport Bank brings me to a crawl everytime. In ButcherBlock mountains, the
path leading directly to the docks - as soon as you turn the corner around
the mountain and can see the dock entrance - it slows down considerably.
Even with nobody else around. Also, the hallway just past the zone when
leaving Kaladim always lags for me until I get outside.

It annoys me greatly the number of people that just sit in the bank at
Freeport doing absolutely nothing but taking up space. Last night I couldn't
even get INTO the bank because people were standing around blocking the
door, the hallway and then the windows as well as the door to get around
inside. There must have been no less than 30 people in the bank with maybe 6
using it. It not only creates incredible lag, but is quite annoying not
being able to get in.
